cause.description:
giving you word of honor to help and stop drunk drivers and child molesters, not to give children ANOTHER life - but broaden the view of their present one.
just trying to make a difference in todays' society
1. Children have the right to live.
2. No one has the right to take it from them.
3. Why let it happen, when it can EASILY be stopped.
4. Making a difference starts with something as small as this.
5. Making a difference starts with one person, but grows into many.
cause.mission: To spread the word and stop drunk driving and child molesters around the world
cause.name: Save A Child
